if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"board(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to deposit"}},"disembark(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to withdraw"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantCommanderRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to which the Commander role will be granted"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Overrides the grantRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role granting."},"harvest(address,bytes)":{"params":{"additionalData":"Optional bytes that might be required by a specific protocol to harvest","rewardToken":"The reward token address"},"returns":{"_0":"The number of reward tokens harvested"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"rate()":{"returns":{"supplyRate":"The current rate in RAY precision"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeCommanderRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account from which the Commander role will be revoked"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Overrides the revokeRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role revoking."},"setMaxAllocation(uint256)":{"params":{"newMaxAllocation":"The new maximum allocation amount"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"totalAssets()":{"returns":{"assets":"The total assets in the Ark, in token precision"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ArkPoked(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the Ark is poked and the share price is updated"},"ArkPokedNoChange()":{"notice":"Emitted when the Ark is poked and the share price did not change"},"ArkPokedTooSoon()":{"notice":"Emitted when the Ark is poked twice in the same block"},"Boarded(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are boarded (deposited) into the Ark"},"DepositCapUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the deposit cap of the Ark is updated"},"Disembarked(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are disembarked (withdrawn) from the Ark"},"Harvested(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a harvest operation is completed"},"MaxAllocationUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the maximum allocation of the Ark is updated"},"Moved(address,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are moved from one address to another"},"RaftUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the Raft address associated with the Ark is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"board(uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits (boards) tokens into the Ark"},"commander()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the Fleet commander managing the ark"},"disembark(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws (disembarks) tokens from the Ark"},"grantCommanderRole(address)":{"notice":"Grants the Commander role to a given account"},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"This function always reverts with a DirectGrantIsDisabled error."},"harvest(address,bytes)":{"notice":"Triggers a harvest operation to collect rewards"},"maxAllocation()":{"notice":"Returns the maximum allocation for this Ark"},"poke()":{"notice":"Updates information about the Ark"},"raft()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the associated Raft contract"},"rate()":{"notice":"Returns the current rate of the Ark"},"revokeCommanderRole(address)":{"notice":"Revokes the Commander role from a given account"},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"This function always reverts with a DirectRevokeIsDisabled error."},"setMaxAllocation(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets a new maximum allocation for the Ark"},"token()":{"notice":"Returns the ERC20 token managed by this Ark"},"totalAssets()":{"notice":"Returns the current underlying balance of the params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit
The amount of tokens to withdraw

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.account: The account to which the Commander role will be granted

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Overrides the grantRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role granting.

params.additionalData: Optional bytes that might be required by a specific protocol to harvest

returns._0: The number of reward tokens harvested

returns.supplyRate: The current rate in RAY precision

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.account: The account from which the Commander role will be revoked

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Overrides the revokeRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role revoking.

returns.assets: The total assets in the Ark, in token precision

commander().notice: Returns the address of the Fleet commander managing the ark

grantCommanderRole(address).notice: Grants the Commander role to a given account

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: This function always reverts with a DirectGrantIsDisabled error.

harvest(address,bytes).notice: Triggers a harvest operation to collect rewards

maxAllocation().notice: Returns the maximum allocation for this Ark

raft().notice: Returns the address of the associated Raft contract

rate().notice: Returns the current rate of the Ark

revokeCommanderRole(address).notice: Revokes the Commander role from a given account

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: This function always reverts with a DirectRevokeIsDisabled error.

setMaxAllocation(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum allocation for the Ark

token().notice: Returns the ERC20 token managed by this Ark

totalAssets().notice: Returns the current underlying balance of the Ark
